name: Teensy Watch Games Pack5: 2-in-1
description:
Teensy Watch Games Pack5 has two fun puzzle games for your apple watch.

Color Panic
Want to test your analytical skills ? Color panic is a fun puzzle game for your apple watch. Quickly tap the correct color tile before time expires.

Speed Math
Test your basic mathematics skills in this fast paced game. Choose the right answer before time runs out.



Support and Feedback:

If you have any technical issue please contact us at teensystudios@gmail.com.
Please include the device information and if possible send a screenshot of the problem.
The more information that you provide to us, the better we can serve you and
fix the bugs that may exist.
